verifyNoVulgar(String) - Method in class com.ctb.util.RandomWordGenerator
This checker can be used to verify that any string does not contain a vulgar word.
List is included here instead of in CTBConstants so as to offend as few developers as possible.
verifyNotNegative(String) - Method in class com.ctb.util.RandomWordGenerator
This checker can be used to verify that any string does not contain a negative word.
